verses.text: \w By|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5060"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w the|strong="H5060"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* settled \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H5060"\w* \w towns|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5060"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w assembled|strong="H3478"\w* \w as|strong="H3389"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6965"\w* \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jozadak|strong="H3136"\w* \f + \fr 3:2 \ft Jozadak is a variant of Jehozadak; also in verse 8; see 1 Chronicles 6:14.\f* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w fellow|strong="H1121"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shealtiel|strong="H7597"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* associates, \w began|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* God \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H5930"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w as|strong="H5927"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w set|strong="H3559"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w foundation|strong="H4350"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrificed|strong="H5927"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*—\w both|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*—\w even|strong="H6153"\w* \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* feared \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land.

\w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w also|strong="H6213"\w* \w celebrated|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Tabernacles|strong="H5521"\w* \f + \fr 3:4 \ft That is, Sukkot, the autumn feast of pilgrimage to Jerusalem; also translated as the Feast of Booths or the Feast of Shelters and originally called the Feast of Ingathering (see Exodus 23:16 and Exodus 34:22).\f* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* accordance \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w offered|strong="H6213"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* based \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w prescribed|strong="H3789"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w each|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

After \w that|strong="H3605"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* presented \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w regular|strong="H8548"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w New|strong="H2320"\w* \w Moons|strong="H2320"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w* sacred \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* well \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w freewill|strong="H5071"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w first|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Israelites \w began|strong="H2490"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w although|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w laid|strong="H3245"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w masons|strong="H2672"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w carpenters|strong="H2796"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w food|strong="H3978"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w drink|strong="H4960"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* people \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Sidon \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6876"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* cedar \w logs|strong="H6086"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Joppa|strong="H3305"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w as|strong="H5414"\w* authorized \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Persia|strong="H6539"\w*. Temple Restoration Begins

\w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* arrived \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shealtiel|strong="H7597"\w*, \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jozadak|strong="H3136"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rest|strong="H7605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* associates \w including|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* returned \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*, \w began|strong="H2490"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w appointed|strong="H5975"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w age|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w older|strong="H4605"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w supervise|strong="H5329"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* construction \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Kadmiel|strong="H6934"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* (\w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Yehudah),\f + \fr 3:9 \ft Hebrew sons of Judah; that is, most likely, sons of Yehudah, another name for Hodevah or Hodaviah; see Ezra 2:40 and Nehemiah 7:43.\f* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Henadad|strong="H2582"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*—\w all|strong="H6213"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*—joined \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w supervise|strong="H5329"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w working|strong="H6213"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God.

\w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w builders|strong="H1129"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w laid|strong="H3245"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w apparel|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* (\w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Asaph) \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w*, \w took|strong="H5975"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* positions \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* prescribed.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w sang|strong="H1984"\w* responsively \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="H3034"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: “\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w loving|strong="H2896"\w* \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w* \f + \fr 3:11 \ft Forms of the Hebrew chesed are translated here and in most cases throughout the Scriptures as loving devotion; the range of meaning includes love, goodness, kindness, faithfulness, and mercy, as well as loyalty to a covenant.\f* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w endures|strong="H5769"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w*.” \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w gave|strong="H7321"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w shout|strong="H7321"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H5769"\w* \w laid|strong="H3245"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7200"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w older|strong="H1419"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w family|strong="H1004"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w who|strong="H3548"\w* \w had|strong="H5869"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w loudly|strong="H6963"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H3548"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*. Still, \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w others|strong="H7227"\w* \w shouted|strong="H8643"\w* \w joyfully|strong="H8057"\w*.

\w The|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w could|strong="H5234"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w distinguish|strong="H5234"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w shouts|strong="H8643"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* making \w so|strong="H3588"\w* \w much|strong="H1419"\w* \w noise|strong="H6963"\w*. \w And|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* \w was|strong="H6963"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w afar|strong="H7350"\w*.
